tables.rationale: This table disaggregates revenue by product/service offering including Google Search & other, YouTube ads, Google Network, Google advertising, Google subscriptions, platforms, and devices, Google Services total, Google Cloud, Other Bets, and total revenues for years ended 2023 and 2024, with units in millions, from Item 8.

This table presents revenues by geographic area including United States, EMEA, APAC, Other Americas, hedging gains (losses), and total revenues for years ended 2023 and 2024, with units in millions, from Item 8.

This table provides a detailed disaggregation of revenues by type including Google Search & other, YouTube ads, Google Network, Google advertising, Google subscriptions, platforms, and devices, Google Services total, Google Cloud, Other Bets, hedging gains (losses), and total revenues for years ended 2022, 2023, and 2024, with units in millions, from Item 8.
